    • Uses of User in controllers

      Fields in controllers declared as User 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static User Main.bart 
      private static User Main.homer 
      private static User Main.lisa 
      private static User Main.maggie 
      private static User Main.marge 
      Fields in controllers with type parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<User> Main.users 
      Methods in controllers with parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Home.byConversation(User user)
      This method creates and renders a list of conversations between a user and all its friends A single conversation between 2 users comprises a list of messages ordered by date-time.
      static void Home.byUser(User user)
      Sort a copy of a specific user's inbox.
      (package private) static java.util.ArrayList<Message> Home.getConversation(User user, User friend)
      Generates a conversation comprising a list of messages between two users.
      static void Home.index(User user)
      Dispatches a list of messages in the user's inbox to HomeView for rendering This method simulates the Play version of spaceboook Home page responding to BY DATE button press Note that the method HomeView.index(User, ArrayList ) could have been condensed to HomeView.index(User) since the reference to outbox is available from within the User object.

      Method parameters in models with type arguments of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void LeaderBoard.index(java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
      Sorts an arraylist of users by the most social (size of their friend list).
      static void LeaderBoard.leastTalkative(java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
      Sorts an arraylist of users by the least talkative (the size of their outbox).
      static void LeaderBoard.talkative(java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
      Sorts an arraylist of users by the most talkative (the size of their outbox).
      Constructors in models with parameters of type User 
      Constructor and Description
      Friendship(User sourceUser, User targetUser)

    • Uses of User in views

      Methods in views with parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void HomeView.byConversation(User user, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Message>> conversations)
      Displays a list of conversations A conversation comprises a time-ordered list of messages Thus a list of conversations is a list of list of messages
      static void HomeView.byUser(User user, java.util.ArrayList<Message> inbox)
      Displays a list of messages ordered by user, that is, grouped by senders
      static void HomeView.index(User user, java.util.ArrayList<Message> inbox)
      Displays a list of messages ordered by time-date
